text: Amzat Boukari-Yabara is a French pan-Africanist historian from Benin. His books explain the history of important people, places, and events in pan- Africanism. He also discusses politics today, often criticizing France, the United States, and neocolonialism. == Books == * Nigéria, De Boeck, 2013 * Mali, De Boeck, 2015 * Africa Unite! Une histoire du panafricanisme, La Découverte, 2017 * Walter Rodney: Un historien engagé, 1942-1980, Présence Africaine, 2018 ==References== Category:French historians Category:Pan- Africanists Category:1981 births Category:Beninese people
title: Amzat Boukari-Yabara
